name: kapa.ai
headline: Create enterprise-grade AI assistants from your content
description:
kapa.ai makes it easy for technical companies to build AI support and onboarding bots for their users. Teams at +150 leading startups and enterprises incl. OpenAI, Mixpanel, Mapbox, Docker, Next.js and Prisma use kapa to level up their developer experience and reduce support.

We enable companies to use their existing technical knowledge sources incl. docs, tutorials, chat logs, and GitHub issues to generate AI bots that answers developer questions automatically. More than 750k developers have access to kapa.ai via website widgets, Slack/Discord bots, API integrations, or via Zendesk.

founders.name: Emil Soerensen, Founder
founders.description: Emil is the co-founder and CEO of kapa.ai (S23). Previously worked as an Engagement Manager at McKinsey & Company. Holds an MSc in Computer Science from Imperial College London and an MSc in Finance from London School of Economics (both with Finn!). 👋

founders.name: Finn Bauer, Founder
founders.description: Finn is the co-founder and CTO of kapa.ai (S23). Previously worked as a software engineer at Bloomberg. Holds an MSc in Computer Science from Imperial College London and an MSc in Finance from the London School of Economics (both with Emil!).

## How kapa.ai works 
## We transform your knowledge base into an reliable and production-ready AI-powered [answer engine optimized for accuracy](https://www.kapa.ai/<./product/answering-engine>).
###### Connect Knowledge Sources
Use your [existing knowledge sources](https://www.kapa.ai/<https:/docs.kapa.ai/data-sources/supported-data-sources>) from our catalogue of +40 technical source connectors.

## +40 LLM-optimized knowledge source integrations available
## Automatically refreshing and secure data connectors that support all common data sources. See all [supported integrations](https://www.kapa.ai/<https:/docs.kapa.ai/data-sources/supported-data-sources>).
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/BfLq8VCmFztWNQdaUpWCdD77ic.png?scale-down-to=1024)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/BfLq8VCmFztWNQdaUpWCdD77ic.png?scale-down-to=1024)
## Accuracy is everything
## We optimize kapa for one thing: providing the most accurate answers about your product. That system is what we call the [Answer Engine](https://www.kapa.ai/<./product/answering-engine>).
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/RO51OCz7HTo25SH5hmC7w6oSHo.png)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/RO51OCz7HTo25SH5hmC7w6oSHo.png)
###### Grounded Answers with Citations
Provides answers based only on your knowledge content, ensuring users get explainable answers.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/JxpGilFwQgwUisp0p6GYbFYHQcI.png)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/JxpGilFwQgwUisp0p6GYbFYHQcI.png)
###### Knows When To Say "I Don't Know"
Acknowledges limitations when information is unavailable and suggests relevant resources.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/PlpEL57SyEi2F5rbdgNkQYeEs.png)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/PlpEL57SyEi2F5rbdgNkQYeEs.png)
###### Optimized For Combining Knowledge Sources
Synthesizes information from multiple sources to provide comprehensive answers.

### Kapa.ai: Making AI Support Effortless

**Company Overview**
Kapa.ai, founded in 2023, is a dynamic startup revolutionizing the way technical companies handle support and onboarding through AI. Based in the Y Combinator Batch S23, Kapa.ai has already garnered attention from over 150 leading startups and enterprises, including high-profile names like OpenAI, Mixpanel, Mapbox, and Docker. With a small but mighty team of nine, their mission is clear: to transform existing content into enterprise-grade AI assistants.

**What Do They Offer?**
Kapa.ai specializes in utilizing existing technical knowledge sources—think documentation, tutorials, chat logs, and GitHub issues—to create AI bots capable of automatically answering developer questions. This not only enhances the developer experience but effectively reduces the need for extensive support efforts. With access already extended to over 750,000 developers through website widgets, Slack/Discord bots, API integrations, and Zendesk capabilities, they're making a significant impact on how tech companies approach support.

**How It Works**
1. **Connect Knowledge Sources**: Kapa allows companies to seamlessly integrate with a wide range of existing data sources, empowering them to leverage the knowledge they've already built.
   
2. **Deploy AI Assistant**: Whether it’s on documentation, in Slack, Discord, or through APIs, Kapa’s AI assistants are designed to answer questions where users need them most.

3. **Analytics and Insights**: Beyond just answering queries, Kapa.ai provides valuable analytics that help identify documentation gaps and optimize user engagement. This ensures companies can continuously improve their support and product offerings.

**Impact on Clients**
Users report remarkable outcomes, citing significant reductions in support tickets (up to 20% monthly), and that Kapa.ai handles over 80% of developer inquiries, liberating their teams to focus on more strategic tasks. David Schroeder, Senior Manager of Technical Support at Mapbox, noted the critical role Kapa plays in their community support.

**Future Aspirations**
With recent funding of $3.2 million aimed at expanding their capabilities, Kapa.ai is well on its way to becoming a staple in the technical support landscape. The focus on accuracy is adamant: their unique 'Answer Engine' ensures that AI responses are grounded in verified company knowledge.

**Why Choose Kapa.ai?**
For technical companies seeking a way to automate support and enhance user onboarding without sacrificing quality, Kapa.ai emerges as a promising solution. The integration of AI isn’t just about being trendy; it’s about fundamentally rethinking developer interactions and support infrastructures in a way that’s smart, efficient, and user-friendly.

For more information, visit [Kapa.ai](https://www.kapa.ai).
